narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the requirements for obtaining a Class "C" exhibitors license. The license fee should be sent to
the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr. Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
Note:The pre licensing process must be completed within 90 days or the pre-license application will be cancelled
and the application fee forfeited.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
